amendatorysection.catchline: Contingent durable power of attorney, defined.
amendatorysection.para: Contingent durable power of attorney shall mean a power of attorney not affected by, but made operative only upon, the occurrence of incompetence of the principal or some other contingency without regard to any concurrent or later occurrence of incompetence of the principal or uncertainty as to the death of the principal as permitted by the Uniform Durable Power of Attorney Act or any other applicable provisions of the Nebraska Probate Code.

crossreference.para: Uniform Durable Power of Attorney Act, see section 30-2664.
